citations.narrative:
***The enclosure fence for the large pen housing the water buffalo and cattle is in disrepair. The enclosure has been
affected by severe erosion leaving the fence leaning in several areas with fence boards loose and boards observed laying
on the ground. The wire attached to the fence has been bent and torn leaving areas no longer attached and sharp points
which may cause injury.
The fence shall be repaired to securely maintain the animals within their enclosure and protect them from possible injury.
Correct by November 22, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Owner.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
***The enclosure fence for the large pen housing the water buffalo and cattle is in disrepair. The enclosure has been 
affected by severe erosion leaving the fence leaning in several areas with fence boards loose and boards observed laying 
on the ground. The wire attached to the fence has been bent and torn leaving areas no longer attached and sharp points 
which may cause injury.  
 
The fence shall be repaired to securely maintain the animals within their enclosure and protect them from possible injury. 
 
Correct by November 22, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Owner. 
 
 n
